description:
Pastebin is the webOS client for the Pastebin.com website. 

*New in this version* 
In app preview of Pastes
Duplicate Paste check
Fixed inherit settings
Other bug fixes

Existing features:
Uses the v3 Pastebin.com API
User account support
My Pastebin support
On device deletion
Mass delete of Pastes
User stats page
Subdomains have been deprecated
Email have been deprecated

Features:
Palm dark & Classic theme
Supports landscape mode
New advanced settings UI
Open in browser
Send via email
Share via SMS 
Copy to clipboard 
History of your Pastes. 
History sharing options.

Pastebin.com is a website where you can store text for a certain period of time. The website is mainly used by programmers to store pieces of sources code or configuration information, but anyone is more than welcome to paste any type of text.
 
This app will post your text to Pastebin.com and provide options to share the link provided. It will also provide your Pastbin.com history if you are logged in.

Due in future versions:
Share via Twitter
Share via Facebook 
Just Type Quick Actions

We are not affiliated with Pastebin.com but have received permission to produce this app.
